definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Peace and stability in the South China Sea is simply indispensable when we talk about development of countries in the region.
sentences.chinese: 南海和平穩定是本地區各國發展的必要條件。

sentences.english: In order for slang to be slangy, it has to have a feeling of perpetual newness.
sentences.chinese: 成爲俚語的必要條件是有一種常新的感覺。

sentences.english: The diversity and cause of man-earth system are the basic content of man-earth relationship.
sentences.chinese: 人地系統的調整與優化是城市可持續發展的必要條件。

sentences.english: To know paralanguage exactly is quite essential for successful communication.
sentences.chinese: 正確解讀副語言符號是交際成功的必要條件。

sentences.english: Mr Pyne seeks to identify the necessary conditions for successful exploration.
sentences.chinese: 潘恩先生試圖尋找成功探索的必要條件。

sentences.english: What are the boundary conditions, the requirements, for stable complexity?
sentences.chinese: 穩定的複雜性有什麼限制條件，必要條件？

sentences.english: You may wonder if light is also needed for life to form.
sentences.chinese: 你可能在想光也是生命形成的必要條件。

sentences.english: First the article obtain some necessary conditions for the existence of relative difference sets.
sentences.chinese: 首先得到相對差集存在的一些必要條件。

sentences.english: This fusion is called osseointegration, and is necessary for implants to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 這種融合被稱爲骨結合，這是種植牙成功的必要條件。

sentences.english: The requirement for laughter is another person.
sentences.chinese: 笑的必要條件是有另一個人存在。

sentences.english: Traces of surface corrosives are, however, necessary for the chem. ical reaction to take place.
sentences.chinese: 少量的表面鏽蝕是漆膜的化學反應發生的必要條件。

sentences.english: Another essential condition for a weak army fighting a strong one is to pick out the enemy's weaker units for attack.
sentences.chinese: 弱軍對於強軍作戰的再一個必要條件，就是揀弱的打。

sentences.english: Steadying and maintaining plating liquid is the essential condition of the guarantee to electroplate quality.
sentences.chinese: 穩定鍍液和鍍液的維護是保證電鍍質量的必要條件。

sentences.english: In fact, many agile methodologies consider this a critical requirement for success.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，許多敏捷方法認爲這是成功的必要條件。

sentences.english: Further, in this paper the sufficient and necessary condition for the duality of this linear invertible transform is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得出了這類線性可逆變換存在對偶性的充分必要條件。

sentences.english: The tectonically deformed coal is the essential condition of coal and gas outbursts.
sentences.chinese: 構造煤是發生煤與瓦斯突出的必要條件。

definition: to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
hard power (i.e. military and economic power)
ability to make one's own decisions
independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
